data.description: DBI Driver for ebay web services API
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DBD::ebay is requested since it is a DBI driver abstraction for the
    ebay wen services API. This driver provides a data model abstraction
    and SQL syntax for the ebay web services API. It provides both a
    novel example use of the DBI, as well as a simplified access method
    for the API.
